/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The road is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings line the sides of the road, adding to the urban atmosphere. In the distance, cranes can be seen, suggesting ongoing construction or development in the area. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene.
